dockerfile.description: Relative path to the Dockerfile used to build this container.

context.description: The build context for the container. This is a path specified relative to the directory containing the service.yaml file. This defaults to the directory containing the dockerfile.

args.description: A map containing entries to be passed to --build-arg when building the container.

Rebuild.description: Rebuild metadata for containers. When you specify the appropriate rebuild properties, forge will use these to perform fast incremental container builds.

root.description: The root path where sources live inside the container. All files and directories listed in the sources array are copied to this location prior to executing a build.

command.description: The command that is executed inside the container in order to perform a build.

sources.description: An array of files or directories that will be copied into the container prior to performing a build.

Config.description: Arbitrary application defined configuration parameters for a service.

title: Service
description: Metadata necessary to build and deploy a service from source.

requires.description: A list of any services required for this service to function.

containers.description: A list of containers that form this service. If this is not supplied then any Dockerfile is assumed.

config.description: Arbitrary application defined configuration parameters for a service.
